div.div: QUICK, YOU'VE ONLY GOT A FEW HOURS LEFT

div.a: 63 Essential Things To Learn Before 2012 Ends

div.div: We learned a lot this year—and we shared a lot of it with you. Here's the complete collection of everything we explained, defined, spelled out and broke down in 2012.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VfhBjp&via=Digg&text=63 Essential Things To Learn Before 2012 Ends

div.div: New Year's Day is consistently one of the most dangerous days of the year for drivers. Not surprisingly, a unusually large percentage of car accidents tomorrow will involve alcohol -- in 2009, alcohol played a role in 40 percent of fatal crashes, as opposed to 32 the rest of the year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vs60ji&via=Digg&text=The Geography Of Drunk Driving

div.a: Classic New Year's Eve Rock Posters

div.div: Here are some of the best posters spanning 4 decades for rock concerts held on New Year's Eve.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UeF2K7&via=Digg&text=Classic New Year's Eve Rock Posters

div.a: Meet The Most Spoiled Bombing Suspect In New York City

div.div: The case has all the makings of a tabloid reporter's dream: a super-privileged mom-to-be, living in one of the cushiest neighborhoods in Manhattan, apparently devising bombs with her OWS boyfriend.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WVZQa8&via=Digg&text=Meet The Most Spoiled Bombing Suspect In New York City

div.a: Military Must Prep Now For 'Mutant' Future, Researchers Warn

div.div: The U.S. military is already using, or fast developing, a wide range of technologies meant to give troops what California Polytechnic State University researcher Patrick Lin calls “mutant powers.” Greater strength and endurance. Superior cognition. Better teamwork. Fearlessness.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZOF8yt&via=Digg&text=Military Must Prep Now For 'Mutant' Future, Researchers Warn

div.div: HE CAN STEAL FROM SECRET SERVICE AGENTS

div.a: The Spectacular Thefts Of The World's Best Pickpocket

div.div: He instructed Pen Jillette to place a ring that he was wearing on a piece of paper and trace its outline with a pen. Jillette removed his ring, put it down on the paper, unclipped a pen from his shirt, and leaned forward, preparing to draw. After a moment, he froze and looked up. His face was pale. “F*ck. You,” he said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RqaXc4&via=Digg&text=The Spectacular Thefts Of The World's Best Pickpocket

div.a: Confessions Of An Ex-Geek Squad Agent

div.div: The fixing computers part of the job in Geek Squad was probably 15% of the job, maybe even less.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UgE2Ut&via=Digg&text=Confessions Of An Ex-Geek Squad Agent

div.a: The Drug That Costs $28,000 A Vial

div.div: THE doctor was dumbfounded: a drug that used to cost $50 was now selling for $28,000 for a 5-milliliter vial.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UfwFy0&via=Digg&text=The Drug That Costs $28,000 A Vial

div.a: Distorted Facebook Message Saves Woman's Life

div.div: A woman is having what is believed to be a stroke. She manages to drag her laptop toward her and sends an almost incomprehensible call-for-help Facebook message to her husband.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10FjMCJ&via=Digg&text=Distorted Facebook Message Saves Woman's Life

div.a: German Magazine Mistakenly Publishes Bush Obituary

div.div: Germany's respected news weekly 'Der Spiegel' mistakenly published an obituary Sunday for former U.S. President George H.W. Bush, hours after a family spokesman said the 88-year-old was recovering from illness.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ucf3TI&via=Digg&text=German Magazine Mistakenly Publishes Bush Obituary

div.a: What Gets Dropped On New Year's Eve In Different Cities?

div.div: New Year's Eve isn't just for New Yorkers. Sure, they get their fancy ball drop, watched by millions. But cities and towns across the United States have their own traditions for ringing in the New Year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/tuDCyt&via=Digg&text=What Gets Dropped On New Year's Eve In Different Cities?

div.a: Psy Says 'Gangnam Style' Will Be 'Ending' On New Year's Eve

div.div: "The song became too popular," Psy says about his smash, which he'll perform on "Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12SOfgn&via=Digg&text=Psy Says 'Gangnam Style' Will Be 'Ending' On New Year's Eve

div.a: How To Read A Book Every Day

div.div: I made a New Year’s resolution to read a book a day in 2012. In 2013, you can too.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12SJqDB&via=Digg&text=How To Read A Book Every Day

div.a: Steve Wozniak Gushes Over App That Takes Panoramas Using iPhone's Vibration

div.div: Cycloramic is an iPhone app that uses the vibrate function to steadily rotate the phone while it stands on its end, creating a 360-degree video panorama in the process.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VhPFeu&via=Digg&text=Steve Wozniak Gushes Over App That Takes Panoramas Using iPhone's Vibration

div.a: The Words That Will Be Banished In 2013

div.div: Here are the words that should be banished from the English language according to Michigan's Lake Superior State University.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uh69me&via=Digg&text=The Words That Will Be Banished In 2013

div.a: Guy Who Won Two Olympic Gold Medals Detained Six Months Ago On Suspicion Of Being A Terrorist

div.div: Mo Farah, gold-medal winner in the men's 5,000m and 10,000m this summer in London, hilarious celebrator, and world-famous meme, couldn't get through customs in Oregon over the Christmas holiday because he is of Somalian descent.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UfV8BF&via=Digg&text=Guy Who Won Two Olympic Gold Medals Detained Six Months Ago On Suspicion Of Being A Terrorist

div.div: Z AND X ARE SO OVERRATED

div.a: Rethinking The Value Of Scrabble Tiles

div.div: When Alfred Butts invented Scrabble in 1938, he based the values and distribution of letters on the frequency of their appearance on the front page of the New York Times. Today, Butts' distribution is still the standard for English play.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VjLqiv&via=Digg&text=Rethinking The Value Of Scrabble Tiles

div.a: Where To Watch New Year's In Times Square Live Online And On Your Phone

div.div: It’s time once again to watch the ball drop on Times Square. Don’t want to actually wait in person on Times Square? No worries, there are plenty of opportunities to watch all the action on the web, on your iPhone and on your Android handset.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vf4KxC&via=Digg&text=Where To Watch New Year's In Times Square Live Online And On Your Phone

div.a: How To Avoid Drunk Texting This New Year's Eve

div.div: The only thing worse than a drunk text is a drunk holiday text. Here's how to protect you from yourself this New Year's Eve.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uh771T&via=Digg&text=How To Avoid Drunk Texting This New Year's Eve

div.a: How Real Navy SEALs Would Handle Famous Movie Missions

div.div: How the SEALs would handle the harrowing moment of movies from 'Return of the Jedi' to 'The Dark Knight Rises'.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UfxCqe&via=Digg&text=How Real Navy SEALs Would Handle Famous Movie Missions

div.a: Who Are The Most Admired People In 2012?

div.div: According to Gallup, these are the people Americans admired most in 2012.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10Ef73V&via=Digg&text=Who Are The Most Admired People In 2012?

div.a: The Search For A Lost Jungle City

div.div: The true story of a journalist seeking fabled ruins in a Central American jungle is a pulp adventure come to life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VqLsYt&via=Digg&text=The Search For A Lost Jungle City

div.div: LATENCY - THE SINE QUA NON OF AR AND VR

div.a: The One Thing Keeping Google-Style Virtual Reality From Being Science Fact

div.div: Here's a ridiculously wonky (but incredibly cool) explanation of how latency is still a huge hurdle to making augmented and virtual reality real.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UbrBL0&via=Digg&text=The One Thing Keeping Google-Style Virtual Reality From Being Science Fact

div.a: New Year's Is The Deadliest Day For Pedestrians

div.div: New Year’s Day is the deadliest time to be a pedestrian.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12SYEbT&via=Digg&text=New Year's Is The Deadliest Day For Pedestrians
